randstad-inhouse.title: Randstad Inhouse — intake from 3 days to 3 hours

quote.text: Recruiters see which candidates are call-ready. Everything sits in the ATS with full context.
quote.author: Recruitment Team Lead

randstad-inhouse.problem: Recruiters received hundreds of emails and WhatsApp messages weekly. Candidate data was scattered, causing days-long intake cycles.
build: WhatsApp intake assistant asking context questions and plugging gaps.
Airtable scorecard that auto-prioritises and assigns recruiters.
Power BI board for daily stand-ups with pipeline status.
result: Managers see bottlenecks in real time and adjust capacity.
Full GDPR logging in SharePoint without manual work.
flow: Task in ATS + Slack notification to recruiter

abn-amro-ventures.title: ABN AMRO Ventures — real-time dealflow scoring

quote.text: Every morning we start with a prioritised list. The team sees exactly why deals score, no spreadsheets needed.
quote.author: Investment Manager

abn-amro-ventures.problem: Dealflow entered via email and forms but disappeared into spreadsheets. Partners lacked visibility and prioritisation.
build: Parser unifying email and Formsort leads into Airtable.
AI scoring model trained on historic deals and notes.
Power BI dashboard with status, alerts, and rationale.
result: Partners start with curated, high-impact deals every day.
Scoring is transparent so decisions move faster.

cm-com-support.title: CM.com Support — hybrid AI agent handles 62% of tickets

quote.text: Customers get instant answers and agents receive transcripts plus a recommended fix. The team focuses on exceptions.
quote.author: Head of Support

cm-com-support.problem: Support juggled multiple channels and tools. Repetitive requests still required a human agent.
build: RAG agent on product docs and historic tickets.
Zendesk macros with full context and proposed resolution.
WhatsApp follow-up pushing status updates automatically.
result: 62% of all inquiries resolved without human intervention.
Agents spend time on edge cases and high-touch issues.
Complete audit trail for compliance and QA.
flow: Agent response or Zendesk ticket with context

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions.

questions.q: How long does a typical project take?
questions.a: Most engagements go live within 2-6 weeks depending on scope. We work in two-week sprints with weekly demos.
We work daily with Zapier, Make, n8n, WhatsApp Cloud API, ClickUp, Trello, Airtable, and custom APIs. If your stack isn't listed, there's a good chance we can still connect it.
You receive documentation, logging, and monitoring. We train your team and optionally stay on retainer for optimisations or new flows.
We document data flows, deliver DPAs per vendor, and bake in logging and access management. More details are in the security overview.

questions.q: Can you work with our internal team?
questions.a: Absolutely. We design blueprints and flows so your team can maintain or extend them after handover.
